channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Excel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Excel

item.title: CVE-2018-0907|2024-08-05T03:44:11.684Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20excel
item.description: Microsoft Excel 2007 SP3, Microsoft Excel 2010 SP2, Microsoft Excel 2013 SP1, Microsoft Excel 2016, Microsoft Office 2016 Click-to-Run and Microsoft Office 2016 for Mac allow a security feature bypass vulnerability due to how macro settings are enforced, aka "Microsoft Office Excel Security Feature Bypass".

item.title: CVE-2018-0796|2024-08-05T03:35:49.476Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20excel
item.description: Microsoft Excel in Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Office 2013, and Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability".
